contentfulBlogPost.title: Welcome Thea Flowers, New OSHWA Board President

sidebarGallery.title: Thea Flowers, new OSHWA Board President

childMarkdownRemark.html: Welcome Thea “Stargirl” Flowers as the new OSHWA Board President!

body.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"I am thrilled to be able to welcome ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://thea.codes/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Thea “Stargirl” Flowers","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" as the new OSHWA Board President!","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"As many members of the OSHWA community already know, Thea is a creative technologist and passionate open source advocate. She is the creator of the Winterbloom open source synthesizers (","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://certification.oshwa.org/list.html?q=winterbloom"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"many of which","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" are OSHWA certified). Thea is also the creator of ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://kicanvas.org/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"KiCanvas","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", a maintainer of CircuitPython, and a former Python Software Foundation Fellow. Oh, and she recently ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.oshwa.org/2023/07/19/new-oshw-certification-mark-usage-guide-and-directory-updates/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"redesigned","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" the certification mark brand guide.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"While this marks the end of my tenure as OSHWA Board President, I am excited to remain on the board and support Thea, Alicia, and OSHWA however I can. I also want to thank Alicia and the OSHWA board(s) for allowing me to serve as Board President for the past few years. It has been fantastic to be a part of OSHWA’s growth and maturation.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"I know the rest of the OSHWA community joins me in celebrating Thea’s new role, and is eager to benefit from the energy and ideas she brings with her.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
